name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.0: NEW - Natural language commands (build/fix/ship/upgrade), confidence-based execution, SHIP command safety. v3.2.0: Multi-language support (Python/PHP/Go/Ruby/Rust), README.md context reading. v3.1.0: Project init, rollback safety, security audits. Core features: 4 high-level commands, 70% workflow simplification, full backward compatibility.
